description: A sweet and creamy dessert with festive flavours.
name: Trifle with Panettone & Burnt Cherries Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 100g dark chocolate, keep 20g for garnish and grate into shards
150g cherries, drain and keep the kirsch/juice.

recipeInstructions.text: Heat up a pot to a medium heat and melt 80g of chocolate with the double cream and then remove from the heat to cool.
In another pot on a medium heat, cook the cherries in the liquid they come in until the sauce has reduced for 6 minutes then drain and keep liquid.
Combine the broken pannetone in a bowl with the cooked cherries without the liquid.
Prepare your individual pots or 1 large bowl by layering as below. Place the pannetone/burnt cherry mix at the base. Next add the chocolate cream mix.
Whip the cream into peaks with 2 tablespoons of the cherry liquid. Place the cherry cream on top and then garnish with the 20g of chocolate shards before serving.
